branchCategory.name: MHS4
branchCategory.description: <p>Air Gripper&nbsp;series 90-MHS4 utilizes a wedge cam design to minimize their size yet retains a high holding force.&nbsp;90-MHS4 is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The small size of the units makes them well suited for end-of-arm or space constrained pick-and-place applications.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-MHS4, Air Gripper, 4 Finger, Parallel Style
branchItem.description: <p>Air Gripper series 90-MHS4 utilizes a wedge cam design to minimize their size yet retains a high holding force. 90-MHS4 is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The small size of the units makes them well suited for end-of-arm or space constrained pick-and-place applications.</p>
